comment.author: 91829349@N00
comment._content:
Looks like Lajoie.  I note that the batter is wearing a Cleveland jersey, too, whoever he is.  Did the Yankees not show up that day?

(I know, judging from the crowd, that it's probably pregame batting practice.  Or just a staged shot.)

comment.author: 62154152@N04
comment._content: Ernie Krueger was my uncle and I would love to have an actual COPY of this photograph!

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: juditalcottrogers: We are glad you like this image of your uncle, Ernie Krueger. You can download a digital file of this image by clicking on the Persistent URL above or here: hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ggbain.14682 This will take you into the Prints and Photographs Online Catalog (PPOC) where you can see the different JPEG and TIFF files we have available and select the one you want. We also have two other photographs of him in PPOC: www.loc.gov/pictures/item/ggb2005014684/ and www.loc.gov/pictures/item/ggb2005014069/ which you can download and get copies of as well.
